body:
Hi Bernd,


Thanks for your reply.  I guess I'm hopelessly behind the times when  
it comes to how things are managed on Linux.  I know FreeBSD/Darwin  
still uses the old separate bin directories approach for tool sets.   
Whether it causes problems, I'm not aware.


As for renaming "cv," I don't think that would be a problem since  
hardly anyone uses it.  If you have other specific programs you think  
need renaming, let me know, and I'll make the changes if I can.


Do you distribute a removal script with your package as well, in case  
someone decides to uninstall Radiance?  Just curious.


-Greg
___
